meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>tombstone</kanji> made of a big <kanji>stone</kanji> is used as a <vocabulary>stone monument</vocabulary>. These stones are usually so big that they're used for multiple people who died together.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
